title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9740.9 - Examination of the record after hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9740.9 - Examination of the record after hearing

State Regulations

The record of the hearing shall be confidential, but it may
be examined by either party or their representatives, the executive director, members of the panel or their agents at a place accessible to them and at a
reasonable time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9740.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
